verses.roman:
sanātana-saṅge kariha vana daraśana
sanātanera saṅga nā chāḍibā eka-kṣaṇa

synonyms: sanātana-saṅge—with Sanātana Gosvāmī; kariha—do; vana daraśana—visiting the twelve forests; sanātanera—of Sanātana Gosvāmī; saṅga—association; nā chāḍibā—do not leave; eka-kṣaṇa—even for a moment.
translation: "Visit all twelve forests of Vṛndāvana in the company of Sanātana Gosvāmī. Do not leave his association for even a moment.
